Summary: SPHERE CAME IN FROM WEST TO EAST FAST THEN SLOWED DOWN THEN STOPED THEN DROPED DOWN
divs: Sighting DetailsWE WEAR WATCHING A CONCERT AT LAKE LAS VEGAS AND THE BAND TOOK A BRAKE AND I WAS WAITING FOR MY WIFE WHO WAS IN A STORE I SAW OUT OF THE CORNER OF MY EYE THE OBJECT ,AND CALLED HER TO HURRY AND COME OUT AND SEE WHAT I WAS LOOKING AT ,WELL SHE MISSED IT.WHAT I SAW A BRIGHT SPHERE FLYING OUT OF THE WEST AT HIGH ALTITUDE AND SPEED DESCENDING TO THE EAST AND SLOWING DOWN IT STOPPED, THEN DROPPED LOOKED LIKE STRAIGHT DOWN . ABOUT 2 MINUTES I SAW 2 NELLIS JETS FLYING IN THAT LOCATION AND THEY FLEW A SEARCH PATTERN FALLOWED BY 2 MORE JETS AND 1 HELICOPTER .
